name: Pole Chudes 2015
summary:
Guessing the words while watching a TV show?
Now you can play anytime on the screen of your phone or tablet!

Stretch your brain and make the most of your time in traffic, in line, or on your way to work.
Participate and win in 1/8, quarter-final, semi-final, final and super game.
Collect collections of prizes, achievements and take your rightful place in the ranking of players.
The bank of questions is constantly replenished! See you in the game!

Attention! All prizes in the game are fictitious, are pictures and do not give the right to receive real prizes. ;)
